# Parity solo instant

## Start the instance
```
docker run -p 8545:8545 appliedblockchain/parity-solo-instant
```

or to open the websocket port as well:
```
docker run -p 8545:8545 -p 8546:8546 appliedblockchain/parity-solo-instant
```

This will start a single Parity node running an InstantSeal chain readily accessible at port 8545.


## Available accounts

The following accounts are unlocked and endowed with a lot of Ether:
